snippet: Wright will auction off 20th-century masterpieces, almost half of them by Gio Ponti.
abstract: Wright in Chicago will hold auction of 20th-century Italian masterworks, with almost half of the pieces designed by Gio Ponti.
lead_paragraph: Wright will auction off 20th-century masterpieces, almost half of them by Gio Ponti.

headline.seo: A Chicago Auction Features Italian Masterworks
headline.main: Raising a Paddle for the Gio Pontis
headline.print_headline: Raising a Paddle for the Gio Pontis
